title: How to Download the Bing Daily Image to Your PC

steps.title: Open your web browser to the Bing webpage.
steps.content: Open your web browser to the Bing webpage .

steps.title: Look for and click the button in the lower right hand corner of the webpage that looks like an arrow pointing at a horizontal line.
steps.content: Look for and click the button in the lower right hand corner of the webpage that looks like an arrow pointing at a horizontal line. This is the download button.

steps.title: Read the "riot act".
steps.content: Read the "riot act". Realize that Bing only intends this image to be used as wallpaper and nothing else. It won't let you set it anywhere but as wallpaper on your computer. The licensing to these images will legally restrict their use to any other use you may intend to use it for, but only to be used as desktop images.

steps.title: Save the file, don't just use an "open (file)" option when the downloader opens asking you to choose between the two options.
steps.content: Save the file, don't just use an "open (file)" option when the downloader opens asking you to choose between the two options.

steps.title: Download, install and open the Bing Desktop client on your Windows PC.
steps.content: Download, install and open the Bing Desktop client on your Windows PC.

steps.title: Require the software to use the Bing website image as your Windows background image.
steps.content: Require the software to use the Bing website image as your Windows background image.

steps.title: Give it a few minutes to obtain the new copies of each of the last few days' images.
steps.content: Give it a few minutes to obtain the new copies of each of the last few days' images.

steps.title: Visit the folder that Windows installs a copy of the background file in.
steps.content: Visit the folder that Windows installs a copy of the background file in. You can find these files in C:\Users\(name of registered account user)\AppData\Local\Microsoft\BingDesktop\themes .

steps.title: Open the file that has a file name of today's date.
steps.content: Open the file that has a file name of today's date.

steps.title: Save a copy of that image to your computer.
steps.content: Save a copy of that image to your computer.
